title: @Riot Why does my profile tab now show my flex que rank and not my soloq rank?
body: I'm silver 3 in flex que with like 12 games played. And silver 1 with about a 100 games. I can still hover over to see my other ranks but I don't understand why it would first show the lower ranked que. Could you elaborate.

replies.body: At the moment that space seems to be showing a random rank for everyone. The Dev team currently knows about it and is trying to figure out just what exactly went wrong, but I'd recommend going ahead and posting this over in [**Report a Bug**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) as well to try and drive a little more attention to this!
